class.name: DebugKitLogListener
class.description: A CakeLog listener which saves having to munge files or other configured loggers.

class.name: CookieAuthenticate
class.description: An authentication adapter for AuthComponent. Provides the ability to authenticate using COOKIE

class.name: TokenAuthenticate
class.description: An authentication adapter for AuthComponent. Provides the ability to authenticate using Token

class.name: MultiColumnAuthenticate
class.description: An authentication adapter for AuthComponent. Provides the ability to authenticate using POST data. The username form input can be checked against multiple table columns, for instance username and email

class.description: Manages the connection to one or multiple Gearman queueing servers and exposes methods to execute jobs in the background.

class.description: Utility functions to setup a worker server for Gearman

class.name: PasswordableBehavior
class.description: A cakephp2 behavior to work with passwords the easy way - complete validation - hashing of password - requires fields (no tempering even without security component) - usable for edit forms (allowEmpty=>true for optional password update)

class.description: LinkableBehavior Light-weight approach for data mining on deep relations between models.

class.name: JsonableBehavior
class.description: A behavior that will json_encode (and json_decode) fields if they contain an array or specific pattern.

class.name: GeocoderBehavior
class.description: A geocoding behavior for CakePHP to easily geocode addresses.

class.name: CommonComponent
class.description: A component included in every app to take care of common stuff

class.name: MobileComponent
class.description: Uses Session: User.mobile and User.nomobile - mobile is the auto-detection (true/false) - nomobile can be set by the user and overrides the default behavior/detection (1=true/0=false or -1=null which will remove the override)
